name: sleeping baby dino (bebê dino dormindo)
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
inspired on the sleeping baby t-rex from yimtea on devianart

this is a free pattern

made with:
círculo’s anne in 4587 (green) and 7625 (beige), 1,75mm crochet hook, fiberfill, dark grey thread to
embroider the eyes, pink blush for the cheeks.
final length: 14cm / 5,5 inches
execution time: approximately 3 and a half hour

observation: the portuguese pattern is in brazilian portuguese.

now in french too! thanks to [amydeka](/people/amydeka)
now in spanish too! thanks to zaida valdés

________________________________________

inspirado no sleeping baby t-rex da yimtea no devianart

feito com: 
linha anne, agulha 1,75 e enchimento 
tamanho final: 14 cm

observação: a receita em português é em português do brasil.

agora também em francês! obrigada à [amydeka](/people/amydeka)
agora também em espanhol! obrigada à zaida valdés

__________________________________

la traduction française a sauté les lignes 22-24.

22 – 7 ms, (1 ms, 1 aug) x6, 5 ms (30)
23 – 30 ms 
24 – 8 ms, (2 ms, 1 aug ) x6, 4 ms (36)
